name: SOUL.SCANNER.
description:
OBJECTIVE: Run around and kill enemies to then absorb their souls. I did not implement any damage/game over screen, so just exit when you're not having fun anymore. 

CONTROLS:

  • WASD/ARROWS : MOVEMENT
  • L. CLICK : ENERGY ATTACK
  • RT. CLICK (HOLD) : ABSORB SOULS

Made for TriJam #133 in a little over 3 hrs development time. Art created during pre-production and then split into game assets during development.
Music generated here: https://pernyblom.github.io/abundant-music/index.html
Sound FX generated with: https://www.bfxr.net/
